awd_titl_txt: Upgrading of UCSB Paleomagnetism and Rock Magnetism Labora- tory
awd_abstract_narration: This award provides one-half of the funds required to                      purchase equipment items needed to upgrade the paleomagnetism and               rock magnetism laboratory in the Department of Geological                       Sciences at the University of California-Santa Barbara. The                     remaining funds required will be provided by the institution.                        Equipment items included in the upgrade are a vibrating                    sample magnetometer, Curie balance, and alternating field                       demagnetizer. The upgraded laboratory will support basic research               into the causes of magnetism in rocks, studies of the reversal of               the geomagnetic field, paleomagnetism of the moon and meteorites,               and paleomagnetism related to the tectonic history of California                and SE Asia.
